page.title: 12A Day in the life of Bethany
page.content: 06.50:Daddy gets up and gets ready for work.07.15:Bethany,then Kirsty,get up, come into Mummy's bed to read a book. 07.30:Mummy,Bethany and Kirsty have breakfast.They have Rice Crispies.Kir- sty has a slice of wholemeal bread and butter,Bethany has an apple.They both have pure orange to drink.Mummy packs B's lunch of cooked ham,cucumber,packet of crisps,small choc bar and apple. Mummy has a dish of muesli,a slice of wholemeal toast.Daddy has just 2 slices of wholemeal toast. 07.45:Daddy collects his briefcase,gets into his Ford Granada2.8 Ghia to travel to work at Milton Keynes. 08.00:We go back upstairs to dress. 08.30:just time for B to read her school book and card to Mummy.08.40 with the girls strapped into car seats, we set off in our Ford Fiesta Ghia.
